concept.title: Who We Are
concept.shortdesc: DITA Open Toolkit is maintained and developed by a team of volunteer developers.

conbody.p: The toolkit was originally developed within IBM and was open sourced in 2005. Since that time, DITA-OT has been updated significantly by a various companies and individuals.
